posts.postText: just joined and i was in a the armory as a guard a VIP tells me to come out or i will be slayed then he slayed everyone on the server, he slaped me with 200000+ dmg then he kicks me name is [nnjg] turtle hitman

Ra2z, please do not lie about me abusing. I slayed you and the other guards for a reason.

First, you and the other guards were camping in the armory doing literally nothing, (Just standing there not giving commands)
Secondly, you were talking junk and spamming the chatbox.
And thirdly, I only slapped you and an other guard. But I had a reason for that slap.

I understand you guarding the armory, but just giving no commands is just wrong.
1 no i wasent camping the armory i was guarding it 2 i wasent spamming the chat and plz dont get the whole god damn server to lie about 3 no you slayed the whole server and me

>> i was guarding it 2  

I know you guarded it, but not giving commands, that's gone too far.

>>  i wasent spamming the chat  

Urm, you were, and you were pretty much raging ALOT.

>>  plz dont get the whole god damn server to lie   

How can I make the whole server lie? They were witnesses that knew that I wasn't abusing.


>>  no you slayed the whole server and me 

Incorrect, I only slayed you and the other guard that were camping. I did slay the whole server at one point because people wanted to restart the round.
Dont worry we are friends now :)

im not friends with this ass whole yes i was guarding the armory when another guard was giving orders and no i wasent spamming chat as i said last time and you mass slayed the whole server for 1 guard being in a armory and stop asking me to remove post and stop posting more
God, your an idiot. I only slayed you. I never mass slayed the server. I never told you to stop posting, and right now, your just standing there.

yes you did slay me and another guard yes you did do a mass slay for only me being in armory yes you said to remove my post and we will be friends and yes i was standing still because im posting on fourms and he tryed to kick me for being annoying and for being afk

You need proof, y''know. I didn't do a mass slay. Never did. And I only thought you were afk because you were standing there doing shit. Now, stfu.

PS: There is a thread saying for 100% proof you need to record it.
i still agree with last post and can you stop spamming on my post saying the same stuff both of us will be banned
Lolwut. How am I spamming on your post. I'm just stating the truth.
6 post + 6 for me yes that is spamming

Okay enough, that isn't a correct format and unless you have proof in form of video or screen-shots then there's nothing we can do. Next time, go here http://www.nonerdsjustgeeks.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=15&t=6
And type like a human being.
